thoughts.text: The previous command failed because it produced too much output. I'll break it down into smaller steps and execute them separately. First, I'll download Node.js.
thoughts.reasoning: Breaking down a complex command into smaller steps makes it easier to manage and troubleshoot. It also prevents the command from producing too much output, which can cause it to fail.
thoughts.plan:
- Download Node.js
- Extract Node.js
- Add Node.js to PATH
- Configure npm
- Install NextJS
- Develop the frontend of the app
- Install other necessary libraries
- Start developing the rest of the app
thoughts.criticism: I should have broken down the command into smaller steps from the beginning. This would have prevented the error and made the process easier to manage.
